channel.title: Lalal bct
channel.description:
Ye, I'm going Thursday to the ol' Hotel....then Friday I'm going to MEPS for the physical and crap...then that day I shall find out when I go to BCT (Of course, it'll be after I graduate), WHERE I go to BCT and all that lovely crap.
Although I don't know if I'm making the right decision going into the Guard, (I never wanted to be a reserve, but most of my family wanted me to be reserve rather than active duty)....but my recruiter says I can switch to Active (He better not be lying >_>)....I am going in to be a some sort of radio repair or something, which I have to have top secret clearance (Sounds fucking hot, eh??).
Ye.....wish me luck at MEPS/BCT?? :|

item.title: Lalal bct
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Mine was 144 when my appendix ruptured. And that was after sitting in a bed all night too.

item.title: Lalal bct
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“Original Daniel, post:21, topic:235451”][quote author=sppt link=topic=310515.msg2488980#msg2488980 date=1224002366]

[quote author=Evil_ link=topic=310515.msg2482972#msg2482972 date=1223660658]“ZOMG UR FKN HEART RATE IS LIEK 110 AND IT NEEDS TO BE LIEK < 100”

Wait… Your resting heart rate is 110?
[/quote]
Isn’t that like, really bad?
[/quote]

Yeah it is, the average is 70bpm. It does depend on fitness - I’m an athlete and my heart rate is like 60.

Wiki says that people with a heart rate over 100bpm has something called Tachycardia.[/quote]
Hmm, we measured it at school in Biology class, i think i had 75/130, that’s not too bad for someone who only cycles to school and back, is it?

Read full topic

item.title: Lalal bct
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“Secet, post:12, topic:235451”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=310515.msg2478153#msg2478153 date=1223390767]
It’s an honour to serve for your country.
[/quote]
Yes, it’s an honour to serve for your country, but if you go killing people on other side of the world it’s more like a disgrace.[/quote]

That’s why I’m not in the army. The Dutch are fighting in Afghanistan, while they could’ve just dropped a few bombs and got back home.

item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:7, topic:235451”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=310515.msg2478287#msg2478287 date=1223397904]

It’s an honour to serve for your country.

what country you live in? only americans think like that there is no need to be patriotic
[/quote]

You wouldn’t fight for Britain? GTFO my country!![/quote]
i didnt say that i implied that it wouldnt be an honour, if i had to to defend my freedom then i would

Read full topic

item.title: Lalal bct
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:8, topic:235451”][quote author=goatee link=topic=310515.msg2478370#msg2478370 date=1223401118]

It’s an honour to serve for your country.

what country you live in? only americans think like that there is no need to be patriotic

You wouldn’t fight for Britain? GTFO my country!!
[/quote]I wouldn’t

Got back from MEPS…verdict:

my BMI is 28, max is 26…so, they were like “Ok, we will give you an Arms Test”

and I was like “WTF”
and he said "Well, you basically do stair steppers for 5 minutes at a pace of 120 steps a minute
and I said “Ok, let’s do this shit.”

then we went and I gave a urine sample…and he’s like “Lets check your blood pressure one more time”

so i said “ok lets do this shit” and he’s liek

“ZOMG UR FKN HEART RATE IS LIEK 110 AND IT NEEDS TO BE LIEK < 100”

so he wouldn’t let me do it…

sooo, I get to go back 20081111 (November 11, 2008), they said it would help if I’d just loose the 8 pounds to be under BMI, so no Arms test for me…

With as much pop as I drink, if i laid off that shit, i’d loose fkn 20 pounds lol

So yea…Hopefully it all works out.

btw, sppt, <3 I’d fight for you…even though you hate the fact i’m going to the military :([/quote]
have fun losing limbs and getting PTSD then.

Read full topic

item.description:

It’s an honour to serve for your country.

what country you live in? only americans think like that there is no need to be patriotic
[/quote]

You wouldn’t fight for Britain? GTFO my country!![/quote]I wouldn’t

Got back from MEPS…verdict:

my BMI is 28, max is 26…so, they were like “Ok, we will give you an Arms Test”

and I was like “WTF”
and he said "Well, you basically do stair steppers for 5 minutes at a pace of 120 steps a minute
and I said “Ok, let’s do this shit.”

then we went and I gave a urine sample…and he’s like “Lets check your blood pressure one more time”

so i said “ok lets do this shit” and he’s liek

“ZOMG UR FKN HEART RATE IS LIEK 110 AND IT NEEDS TO BE LIEK < 100”

so he wouldn’t let me do it…

sooo, I get to go back 20081111 (November 11, 2008), they said it would help if I’d just loose the 8 pounds to be under BMI, so no Arms test for me…

With as much pop as I drink, if i laid off that shit, i’d loose fkn 20 pounds lol

So yea…Hopefully it all works out.

btw, sppt, <3 I’d fight for you…even though you hate the fact i’m going to the military
